long_description: A tough waterproof pack for bike commuters, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Commuter Pannier features a dedicated sleeve for a laptop, a shoulder strap, and attachment hardware that hides away after the ride. Thule Pack 'n Pedal Commuter Pannier features a waterproof, roll-top design to keep contents dry; dedicated sleeve fits a 15 in. laptop. Vanishing hardware system flips away when carried off the bike to provide maximum carrying comfort. Attachment system is easy to use, secure and vibration-free. Exterior translucent pockets allow safety light to be used and stored in one convenient location (light not included). Reflective strips increase visibility, and compression straps keep contents securely in place. Integrated grab handle and detachable messenger-style strap allow for multiple carrying options. Universal fit on either side of the bike. Works best with Thule Pack 'n Pedal Tour Rack (sold separately), but will work with virtually any bike rack.
short_description: A tough waterproof pack for bike commuters, the Thule Pack 'n Pedal Commuter Pannier features a dedicated sleeve for a laptop, a shoulder strap, and attachment hardware that hides away after the ride.
